verses.verse: And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me came <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H5782>woke<s%> <S%H376>me<s%>, as a man that is <S%H5782>wakened<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, What see <S%H559>you<s%>? And I said, I have <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and behold a <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> all of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, with a <S%H1531>bowl<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H7651>it<s%>, and his seven <S%H5216>lamps<s%> on <S%H7651>it<s%>, and seven <S%H4166>pipes<s%> to the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, which are upon the top <S%H7218>there<s%>:
And <S%H8147>two<s%> olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> by <S%H259>it<s%>, one upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H1543>bowl<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> upon the left side <S%H8040>there<s%>.
So I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, What are <S%H113>these<s%>, my lord?

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>me<s%>, Know you not what these <S%H559>be<s%>? And I said, <S%H113>No<s%>, my lord.

Then he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Not by <S%H2428>might<s%>, nor by <S%H3581>power<s%>, but by my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Who are <S%H1419>you<s%>, O great <S%H2022>mountain<s%>? <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> you shall become a <S%H4334>plain<s%>: and he shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H68>headstone<s%> there with <S%H8663>shoutings<s%>, <S%H2580>crying<s%>, Grace, grace unto <S%H2580>it<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> have laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%>; his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall also <S%H1214>finish<s%> <S%H3045>it<s%>; and you shall know that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has sent me unto <S%H7971>you<s%>.

For who has <S%H936>despised<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of small <S%H6996>things<s%>? for they shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the plumb <S%H68>line<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> with those <S%H7651>seven<s%>; they are the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which run to and <S%H7751>forth<s%> through the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>I<s%>, and said unto <S%H8147>him<s%>, What are these two olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and upon the left side <S%H8040>there<s%>?

And I <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8147>him<s%>, What be these two <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H7641>branches<s%> which <S%H3027>through<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6804>pipes<s%> <S%H7324>empty<s%> the golden oil out of <S%H2091>themselves<s%>?
And he <S%H559>answered<s%> me and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3045>Know<s%> you not what these <S%H559>be<s%>? And I said, <S%H113>No<s%>, my lord.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8147>he<s%>, These are the two <S%H3323>anointed<s%> <S%H1121>ones<s%>, that <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
